ourPortal.title: Our Portals
ourPortal.subtitle: Through our 24 years of experience, we have established ten specialized portals where you can find exactly what's relevant to you, whether you're looking for public tenders and associated specifications, finding contracts, subcontractors, or otherwise establishing business contacts. Our portals at a glance:

1.title: Government Portals
1.description: Access to 50+ government tender databases worldwide

2.title: Corporate Tenders
2.description: Private sector opportunities from major corporations

3.title: Industry Databases
3.description: Specialized databases for construction, IT, healthcare, and more

groups.title: Which Group Do You Belong To?
groups.subtitle: The Inlocon database and its analysis options are ideal for anyone seeking public tenders. However, we can offer customized, unique, and advanced solutions for the following groups, from which they will particularly benefit!

how.heading: How Inlocon Works
how.subheading: Our streamlined process helps you find and win the right tenders efficiently
how.desc1: Use our advanced search to find relevant tenders across multiple databases and sources.
how.desc2: Apply intelligent filters to match your business capabilities and interests.
how.desc3: Receive real-time alerts for new opportunities that match your criteria.
how.desc4: Connect with partners, submit proposals, and win more business.
